short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts bitcoin values in pages you browse to the fiat currency of your choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will display a bitcoin value (e.g. 39.32 BTC) in the fiat currency of choice right next to it. It checks for BTC prices in your content and automatically converts and displays a selected currency value value inline with the BTC value. You will no longer need to make the conversion by hand or use a calculator.
